pageProduct.name: QV Intensive Cream 100G
pageProduct.description:
General Information

QV Intensive Cream is a rich, fast absorbing, highly concentrated triple moisturising cream designed to provide 24 hour hydration to the skins driest areas without the greasy residue. It's moisturising formula helps with the maintenance of extremely dry and sensitive skin.

Warnings

CAUTION:
Avoid eyes.  For external use only.  Store below 30°C.
Always read the label. Use only as directed.
If symptoms persist please see your healthcare professional.

Common Uses

• Triple-moisturising action, including 10% glycerin, for optimal skin hydration without a greasy residue
• Clinically proven 24-hour moisturisation
• Easily applied and readily absorbed  into the skin without excessive rubbing
• Helps maintain the skin’s natural protective barrier and lock  in moisture
• Preservative free, further reducing the chance of irritancy
• Low-irritant formulation, fragrance, lanolin, propylene glycol and color free
• Non-comedogenic, so it won’t block pores
• Hypoallergenic & Dermatologically Tested

Ingredients

Aqua (Water), Petrolatum, Paraffinum Liquidum, Glycerin, Cyclopentasiloxane, Cyclohexasiloxane, Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Dimethicone, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol

Directions

Apply liberally to the face and body and massage in gently. Use after bathing and showering.

Use QV Intensive Cream in conjunction with the QV Intensive Cleanser everyday.

For cracked or extremely dry skin, also use QV Intensive Body Moisturiser.
